contest-event.event-date:
Jan. 29, 2017 D The British Open Youth at the Guild Festival
The British Open Youth at the Guild Festival 100 Entertainments Contest Brass at the Guild (Preston) the-british-open-at-the-guild-festival
None
Guild Hall (Charter Theatre), Preston, Lancashire, England, UK Own choice programme, 20 minutes. Best soloist - Eb bass - Poynton. Best horn - Wigan Youth Zone. Youngest player - Ruebin Mocano - Poynton. 6 bands competed.
Jan. 22, 2017, 2:32 p.m. March 5, 2017, 12:05 p.m.
1 Youth Brass 2000 Chris Jeans
2 Poynton Youth Mike Eccles
3 Oldham Music Centre Jonathan Leedale
4 Brassed Off Louise Renshaw
5 Stockport Schools' Senior Brass Band Iain McKnight Hinemoa
5 Pemberton Old Wigan DW Youth John Don-Duncan
